articles.title: Kathy Griffin spends part of her Easter holiday getting MRI... following series of health concerns - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kathy Griffin spent part of her Easter holiday getting an MRI in a medical facility, following series of health concerns including lung cancer diagnosis.
articles.content:
It appears Kathy Griffin is dealing with another medical concern.
On Sunday, the comedian and actress had to spend at least part of her Easter holiday undergoing a medical procedure.
